mapper.select: SELECT tnm.novel_seqno, tnm.title, tnm.content, tnm.like_count, tnm.created_user, tcm.code_name as genre_1, tcm2.code_name as genre_2, tcm3.code_name as keyword_1, tcm4.code_name as keyword_2, tcm5.code_name as keyword_3, tcm6.color as genre_1_color, tcm7.color as genre_2_color, tcm8.color as keyword_1_color, tcm9.color as keyword_2_color, tcm10.color as keyword_3_color, description FROM t_novel_mgt tnm LEFT JOIN t_code_mgt tcm ON tnm.genre_1 = tcm.code LEFT JOIN t_code_mgt tcm2 ON tnm.genre_2 = tcm2.code LEFT JOIN t_code_mgt tcm3 ON tnm.keyword_1 = tcm3.code LEFT JOIN t_code_mgt tcm4 ON tnm.keyword_2 = tcm4.code LEFT JOIN t_code_mgt tcm5 ON tnm.keyword_3 = tcm5.code LEFT JOIN t_code_mgt tcm6 ON tnm.genre_1 = tcm6.code LEFT JOIN t_code_mgt tcm7 ON tnm.genre_2 = tcm7.code LEFT JOIN t_code_mgt tcm8 ON tnm.keyword_1 = tcm8.code LEFT JOIN t_code_mgt tcm9 ON tnm.keyword_2 = tcm9.code LEFT JOIN t_code_mgt tcm10 ON tnm.keyword_3 = tcm10.code ORDER BY novel_seqno DESC -- 오름차순 정렬: ASC, 내림차순 정렬: DESC (최신글이 상단에 보이도록 하기 위해 내림차순 정렬)

SELECT sub_novel_seqno, sub_title, sub_content, sub_like_count FROM t_sub_novel_mgt WHERE main_novel_seqno = #{main_novel_seqno} ORDER BY sub_novel_seqno DESC -- 오름차순 정렬: ASC, 내림차순 정렬: DESC (최신글이 상단에 보이도록 하기 위해 내림차순 정렬)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_novel_mgt ( title, content, created_user, genre_1, genre_2, keyword_1, keyword_2, keyword_3, description ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{created_user}, #{genre_1}, #{genre_2}, #{keyword_1}, #{keyword_2}, #{keyword_3} #{description} )
